title: Hackers steal Signal, WhatsApp user data with fake Android chat app
description: Hackers are using a fake Android app named 'SafeChat' to infect devices with spyware malware that steals call logs, texts, and GPS locations from phones. [...]

title: Google warns again it will start deleting inactive accounts in December
description: In emails sent over the weekend, Google warned customers again that it would start deleting inactive accounts on December 1st, 2023. [...]

title: Canon warns of Wi-Fi security risks when discarding inkjet printers
description: Canon is warning users of home, office, and large format inkjet printers that their Wi-Fi connection settings stored in the devices' memories are not wiped, as they should, during initialization, allowing others to gain access to the data. [...]

title: P2PInfect server botnet spreads using Redis replication feature
description: Threat actors are actively targeting exposed instances of the Redis open-source data store with a peer-to-peer self-replicating worm with versions for both Windows and Linux that the malware authors named P2Pinfect. [...]

title: Hackers exploit BleedingPipe RCE to target Minecraft servers, players
description: Hackers are actively exploiting a 'BleedingPipe' remote code execution vulnerability in Minecraft mods to run malicious commands on servers and clients, allowing them to take control of the devices. [...]

title: Microsoft fixes WSUS servers not pushing Windows 11 22H2 updates
description: Microsoft fixed a known issue impacting WSUS (Windows Server Update Services) servers upgraded to Windows Server 2022, causing them not to push Windows 11 22H2 updates to enterprise endpoints. [...]
